title: shabariswaram
sahitya:
shabarIshvaram bhAvayE dharma shAstAram sharmakaram ghanashyAma manOharam

anupallavi

 shabala malayAla dharaNI shubhAkaram sharaNAgata jana pAlana tatparam

caraNam

 paripAvana pampA taTinI taTAgAram paramEsha kEshava yugala puNyOtkaram 
pariNata sOma vadanam parAtparam paramAnandAkAram vana tulasIdharam
